# Angular Portfolio Project

## Project Overview
This is an Angular portfolio website template designed for a UI/UX designer intern. The portfolio includes modern styling, responsive design, and sections for showcasing design work and skills.

## Development Guidelines
- Use Angular best practices and conventions
- Maintain responsive design across all components
- Focus on clean, modern UI suitable for a design portfolio
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Implement proper component architecture

## Project Structure
- Angular CLI-generated project structure
- Portfolio-specific components for different sections
- Modern CSS/SCSS styling
- Template placeholders for easy customization
